@GoaleeGuru @myers8624 @psrhodes1 questions are the same regardless of the win, and they ALWAYS have to learn something from oppo
@GoaleeGuru @myers8624 @psrhodes1 This is something I use for my players to help that reflection post game before we get to video stage.. https://t.co/1USw7RJvMi
@myers8624 @psrhodes1 "Congrats on the win guys!! Let's make sure we do the same to x next weekend. We meet on Monday for video and debrief"
@myers8624 @psrhodes1 "today was a bad day. Rather than rip it to pieces now, go and reflect and we'll get the learning on Monday"
@myers8624 @psrhodes1 maybe try having the same approach after both but with different emotion...
@myers8624 @psrhodes1 if you only ever try to pull out the 'learning' after a win, you are reinforcing that feeling with the players
@myers8624 @psrhodes1 possible, but only if your culture is set up that way with the team values and expectations leading in that direction
